name: Hot Stuff
description: Hot stuff is a VR 360 shooter game where the player must survive an onslaught of mutant hot chillies that have taken over the world. Our character Jane is a picky eater who has broken into the Seedy Corp, The Ground Zero of the Mutant Chilli Epidemic. Jane is here investigate the cause of the mutant chillies. but has run into a horde of chilis and must defend herself with water guns, water balloons, and pool noodles. This game is fun for all ages and facilitates a flow state by using practice raising skills as the difficulty increases with the waves of chillies.
